data.introduce: 该接口用于手动将票价组写入 PNR 中，对应黑屏指令FN。
data.business: 同黑屏FN项输入，支持成人、婴儿、成人换开、IT/BT票FN输入。
data.functions: 基于PNR，支持手工按黑屏指令格式写入FN项。FN不支持换行字符。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFNIntoPNRRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirFNIntoPNRInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FN","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"fn指令","children":[]},{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"pnr号","children":[]},{"name":"Infant","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"婴儿标识，默认false","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名组","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFNIntoPNRRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取预订记录返回","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"返回结果","children":[]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -400 ","name":null,"msg":" format of xml string is not valid ","msgZh":" xml内容格式错误 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirFNIntoPNRRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS177"/>
    </POS>
    <AirFNIntoPNRInfo>
        <!-- PNR号 -->
        <PNR>JPK82E</PNR>
        <!-- fn信息 -->
        <FN>FN/FCNY10.00/SCNY10.00/C3.00/TCNY50.00CN/TCNY60.00YQ</FN>
        <!-- 婴儿标识 -->
        <Infant>true</Infant>
        <!-- 旅客姓名 -->
        <PassengerNames>
            <PassengerName>ZHOU/XIAO</PassengerName>
            <PassengerName>LEI/XIAO</PassengerName>
        </PassengerNames>
    </AirFNIntoPNRInfo>
</TES_AirFNIntoPNRRQ>
